channel.title: Postgresql on 徐林的博客
channel.description: Recent content in Postgresql on 徐林的博客

item.title: 升级 postgresql docker image 镜像的版本
item.description: 问题 直接在 docker-compose.yml 中修改版本后，docker-compose up 运行不起来，会报错。 FATAL: database files are incompatible with server DETAIL: The data directory was initialized by PostgreSQL version 13, which is not compatible with this version 14.3. 解决方法 删掉 v
